title: Two Gunz Up
lyrics:
Featuring Wooh Da Kid & Ice Burgandy
Prod. By Purps On The Beat
(Hook x2: Waka Flocka Flame)
I be gripping them Glock's, my niggas they don't give a fuck
I be gripping them Glock's, my niggas they don't give a fuck

I'm like two guns up, two guns up,

Two guns up, two guns up



(Vere 1: Waka Flocka Flame)

Parking lot, V.I.P., murder

Go and get your boss, I can't talk to no worker

Two guns up, two guns up

Two guns up, two guns up

I'm already drunk, I'm already rolling

I'm too turnt' up, New Port caught my rims stolen

Shitting on my haters, you can call me colon

Me and Wooh Da Kid, layin dropping like Hulk Hogan

Tell me what you drinking, tell me what you smoking

Bad yellow bitches on the stage and they snorting

I'm a party fucking animal, blood brothers

On a different pedestal, I be doing numbers



(Hook: Waka Flocka Flame)

I be gripping them Glock's, my niggas they don't give a fuck

I be gripping them Glock's, my niggas they don't give a fuck

I'm like two guns up, two guns up,

Two guns up, two guns up



(Verse 2: Ice Burgandy)

Two young's up, we the new guns up

Got my jewels done up, I'm with my crew, run up

I be gripping the Glock's, we be ripping them shots

I'm a pimp to the top, you gon' flip then you're flop

Red flag, red drop, red bitch, red top

Fake tits and shots, she tryna' fuck with a boss

She know my watch and chain murder

Assassinate, my name murder

Two guns up if you fucking with my blood brothers



(Hook: Waka Flocka Flame)

I be gripping them Glock's, my niggas they don't give a fuck

I be gripping them Glock's, my niggas they don't give a fuck

I'm like two guns up, two guns up,

Two guns up, two guns up



(Bridge: Waka Flocka Flame)

Parking lot, V.I.P., murder

Go and get your boss, I can't talk to no worker

Two guns up, two guns up

Two guns up, two guns up

Squad



(Verse 3: Wooh Da Kid)

Two guns up, both clips in

Aim on point, I hit you and your friend

New F.N., it'll knock off a limb

Won't thirty-eight me, this not Kobe and Lin

Black diamonds, they banging on a white door

I'm shining, Wooh Da King a light show

All we do is win, what you think I'm hype for?

D.C. snipe, aiming with my rifle



(Hook x2: Waka Flocka Flame)

I be gripping them Glock's, my niggas they don't give a fuck

I be gripping them Glock's, my niggas they don't give a fuck

I'm like two guns up, two guns up,

Two guns up, two guns up
